entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
